prompt: Former Pope Benedict XVI dies at 95
completion:
Former Pope Benedict XVI has died, aged 95, almost a decade after he stood down because of ailing health.

 He led the Catholic Church for fewer than eight years until, in 2013, he became the first Pope to resign since Gregory XII in 1415.

 Benedict spent his final years at the Mater Ecclesiae monastery within the walls of the Vatican where he passed away at 09:34 (08:34 GMT) on Saturday.His successor Pope Francis will lead the funeral on 5 January.
